thread.title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival sale 2025 is now live for Prime members: 5 smartphone deals to check out
thread.title_full: Amazon Great Freedom Festival sale 2025 is now live for Prime members: 5 smartphone deals to check out

author: MC Tech Desk
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival sale 2025 is now live for Prime members: 5 smartphone deals to check out
text: Apple iPhone 16e: Available at Rs 48,999Apple iPhone 16e has received a massive discount and is currently available at under Rs 49,999. In addition to that, buyers can take an additional discount of Rs 1,000 using credit cards. | Apple iPhone 16e review Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra: Available at Rs 75,999Galaxy S24 Ultra has dropped below Rs 80000 and is available at Rs 79,999 after a flat discount. Not only this, you can get an additional Rs 3,999 with the Amazon Pay ICICI Bank card. | 5 Reasons to buy iQOO Neo 10R 5G: Available at Rs 24,999 (with Rs 2,000) discountiQOO Neo 10R is available at Rs 24,999 during the sale. This includes a Rs 2000 coupon available on the listing page. | iQOO 10R review OnePlus 13R: Available at Rs 37,999OnePlus 13R has received a discount of 11% and is available at Rs 39,999. Moreover, buyers can get an additional Rs 2000 cashback on the Amazon Pay card. Infinix Note 50s 5G+: Available at Rs 13,999The phone is available at Rs 14,999 with a flat discount of 25%. You can also avail an additional Rs 1000 discount on credit cards. ",
